alert.note: Alert for McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 6:27PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern McDuffie, Columbia, eastern Lincoln and south central McCormick Counties through 700 PM EST... At 626 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thomson, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grovetown, Evans, Thomson, Martinez, Harlem, Appling, Clarks Hill Recreation Area, J. Strom Thurmond Dam, Riverwood, Dearing, Sweetwater Park, Modoc, Arties Pond Public Fishing Area, McDuffie County Fire Department, Adamsville, Thomson Fire Department, Scott`s Landing, McDuffie Regional Medical Center, White Oak Campground, and Autney. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 173 and 194. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
